name: Tequila Pineapple
description: A simple, but delicious summertime cocktail.
directions: Fill a mixing cup half-full with ice cubes.
Fill a drinking glass half-full with ice cubes.
Add tequila and pineapple juice to the mixing cup and shake well.
With the filter intact on the mixing cup, pour the mixture into the drinking glass.
(Optional) add a marachino cherry or pineapple slice as a garnish.
